SummaryEnglish: An Abridged parody of Yu Yu Hakusho.

1.SummaryEnglish: Yu Yu Hakusho is property of Yoshihiro Togashi, Fuji TV, and Funimation Entertainment this is a fan made parody nothing more.

2.SummaryEnglish: April Foo-- Looks at the calender. Oh, son of a... Yeah, this was going to be my April Fools joke, but unfortunately, things ended up not working out how they were supposed to and I couldn't get it done in time. So, here it is. 2 days late and a dollar short. Still, hope you get some laughs out of it!

5.TitleEnglish: Yu Yu Hakusho: Poltergeist Report Abridged Part 3

Yu Yu Hakusho Poltergeist Report is property of Yoshihiro Togashi, Fuji TV and Central Park Media Yu Yu Hakusho is property of FUNimation Entertainment, Yoshihiro Togashi, and Fuji TV Special Thanks to Special Guest Star: Chuck Huber Music Theme Song - Kill Bill Awaken - Dethklok

Yu Yu Hakusho Poltergeist Report is property of Yoshihiro Togashi, Fuji TV and Central Park Media Yu Yu Hakusho is property of FUNimation Entertainment, Yoshihiro Togashi, and Fuji TV There now I can go back to making Episodes and Rants

7.TitleEnglish: Yu Yu Hakusho Abridged Fan Art Special

1.SummaryEnglish: Yu Yu Hakusho crammed into a 6 Minute byte (bad CPU pun FTW) Special Thanks to Little Kuriboh MasakoX and Vegeta 3986 Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files is property of Funimation Entertainment Songs: Karate - Tenacious D Bad Day - Daniel Powter Black Horse and The Cherry Tree - KT Tunstall Another Irish Drinking Song - DaVinci's Notebook

4.SummaryEnglish: NOTE: THE NEIGHBORHOOD WATCH origionated in this episode, not Naruto tAS 14 Yu Yu Hakusho in less than 9 mins = Fun for all! Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files is property of Funimation Entertainment

5.SummaryEnglish: Yummy Yummy Yummy I got Yu Yu for Your Tummy! Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files is property of Funimation Entertainment

7.SummaryEnglish: Yippy Ky- Yu Yu Hakusho Mother F**ker! Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files is property of Funimation Entertainment

8.SummaryEnglish: The long awaited Episode 8 finally arrives! Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files is property of Funimation Entertainment

9.SummaryEnglish: NOTE: The sign on Kazamaru's Head is not a Nazi Swastika it is a Buddhist swastika,it is a sign of peace. The Nazi Swastika is turned 45 degrees clockwise. Yu Yu Hakusho wrapped up tightly into a meaty 9 minute burrito. Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files is property of Funimation Entertainment

10.SummaryEnglish: Come young ones I bring you sweet YYH goodness in one need little package. Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files is property of Yoshihiro Togashi and Funimation Entertainment

11.SummaryEnglish: I defy you to name something closer to getting the 11th episode of YYH in 6mins other than YYHA!

12.SummaryEnglish: Happy YYHAlloween! Songs- Karate- Tenacious D Short People - Randy Newman In Da Club - 50 Cent Requiem for a Dream

13.SummaryEnglish: I'll add more to this description later but for now I'm tired and need sleep. There I got some sleep - Lani 2017 The Genkai Tournament Comes to a Shocking End.

14.SummaryEnglish: Happy Valentines day everyone Yusuke Makes his triumphant return in this 10 minute chunklet of an episode with a special cameo apperance by Vegeta3986 Yu Yu Hakusho Ghost Files is property of Yoshihiro Togashi and Funimation Entertainment

15.SummaryEnglish: Yu Yu Hakusho in a dagum 7 minute shot of moonshine yeeeeeehaaaaaw Yu Yu Hakusho Ghost Files is property of FUNimation Entertainment, Fuji TV, and Yoshihiro Togashi.

16.SummaryEnglish: Yu Yu Hakusho Episode 16 cut down to a fraction of it's normal time all for your convenience! Yu Yu Hakusho Ghost Files is property of FUNimation Entertainment, Fuji TV, and Yoshihiro Togashi.

17.SummaryEnglish: That's right Yu Yu Hakusho Abridged is back thanks to many generous donators. This time Yu Yu Hakusho is taking the form of a 7 minute cheddar biscuit of delicious buttery love. Introducing Spnkyhappy as Mirugu Yu Yu Hakusho is property of FUNImation Entertainment, Fuji TV, and Yoshihiro Togashi please support the official release.

18.SummaryEnglish: Yu Yu Hakusho is property of Yoshihiro Togashi, FUNimation Entertainment, and Fuji TV please support the official release. Yu Yu Hakusho lovingly crammed into 6 and a half minutes of your life.

19.SummaryEnglish: Featuring Spnkyhappy as Mirugu A delicious combination of Sweet Succulent Yu Yu Hakusho and Lanipator all blended together in a 7 Minute Smoothie. Mmm Mmm Good Yu Yu Hakusho is property of Funimation Entertainment, Fuji TV, and Yoshihiro Togashi Please support the official release.

20.SummaryEnglish: Yu Yu Hakusho delivered fresh to your favorite web browsing device in 10 minutes or less or it's absolutely free! Featuring Spnkyhappy as Mirugu and Lanipator as Everyone else. Dedicated to the memory of Ace Boone Landis. Rest in peace. Yu Yu Hakusho is property of Yoshihiro Togashi, FUNimation Entertainment, and Fuji TV, please support the official release!

21.SummaryEnglish: That's right after taking 3 years to finish one arc I finish this one in a week. Yu Yu Hakusho Rescue Yukina arc packed neatly into a 20 minute slice.
